name: convert
description:
Convert the number into its Arabic text representation
حول العدد إلى ما يقابله كتابة

hundreds_form.description: Some use مائة others use مئة , both works in Arabic. If left empty the default is مائة

the_number.description: Put the number here. Decimal is supported by most units.

unit.description:
The counted subject, be it a currency like درهم إماراتي  or a size unit like متر مربع
If the unit does not appear in the text result, it may not be supported. Please contact us to add it.
